name: Evasion Type Belts Index
description: Index of pure evasion type belts focused on agility and dodge enhancement
general_description: Light utility belts, agility sashes, and movement-enhancing belts designed for maximum mobility. These belts prioritize flexibility and speed while providing streamlined utility for the agile adventurer.

metadata.author: PrimalMyst Development Team
metadata.notes: Simplified index focusing on categorization with existing items list
